name: Welcome Email Automation
description: Automatically send a welcome email when a new user registers

config.subject: Welcome to Our Platform!
config.body:
Hi {{form.name}},

Welcome to our platform! We're excited to have you on board.

Best regards,
The Team

name: Lead Qualification Workflow
description: Qualify leads based on company size and send appropriate follow-up

config.subject: Enterprise Solution Inquiry
config.body:
Hi {{form.name}},

Thank you for your interest in our enterprise solutions. Our sales team will contact you within 24 hours.

Best regards,
Enterprise Sales Team

config.subject: Small Business Solutions
config.body:
Hi {{form.name}},

Thank you for your interest! Check out our small business solutions that might be perfect for your company.

Best regards,
Small Business Team

name: Order Processing Pipeline
description: Process orders with confirmation emails and inventory updates

config.subject: Order Confirmation - #{{form.orderId}}

name: Customer Feedback Processing
description: Process customer feedback and route to appropriate teams

config.subject: Negative Feedback Alert - {{form.customerEmail}}
Thank you for your feedback
config.body:
Hi {{form.customerName}},

Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback. We appreciate your input and will use it to improve our services.

Best regards,
Customer Success Team

name: Newsletter Signup Automation
description: Welcome new newsletter subscribers with a series of emails

config.subject: Welcome to our newsletter!
config.body:
Hi {{form.name}},

Thank you for subscribing to our newsletter! You'll receive our latest updates and exclusive content.

Best regards,
The Newsletter Team

config.subject: Here's what you can expect from our newsletter
config.body:
Hi {{form.name}},

Here's what you can expect from our newsletter:

- Weekly industry insights
- Exclusive offers and discounts
- Product updates and announcements
- Tips and best practices

We're excited to share valuable content with you!

Best regards,
The Newsletter Team
